post.body: Hello ZeroMe!
惊了，Mac下我把ZeroNet直接拖进了应用程序，然后我找不到Data目录在哪了。
开了个新站，用于收集中国墙内媒体曾经发出来后来又被删掉的文章：http://127.0.0.1:43110/lastone.bit/

昨天更新的都是旧的，今天更新了一篇今天凌晨发布仅存活9小时的文章：
《[“十分钟后，设备维修”，突然断电的季风](http://127.0.0.1:43110/lastone.bit/?Post:18:%E2%80%9C%E5%8D%81%E5%88%86%E9%92%9F%E5%90%8E%EF%BC%8C%E8%AE%BE%E5%A4%87%E7%BB%B4%E4%BF%AE%E2%80%9D%EF%BC%8C%E7%AA%81%E7%84%B6%E6%96%AD%E7%94%B5%E7%9A%84%E5%AD%A3%E9%A3%8E)》

其实有人私信问我，为什么不存境外媒体的，为什么不存一些异见人士的稿子。原因有两个，一个是倾向非常明显的文章和墙外文章本身就有大量机构出于自身目的去备份，另一个是我想建的是一个信息馆而不是态度馆，国内正规有备案的媒体现在在碰触敏感话题时的克制基本保证了在写稿的时候没有观点和态度只是记录一些事实，在高压之下拍照技巧和文字表达也比较具有艺术性。

RetroShare 怎么玩？？看起来好像是个新型电驴？
但是打开之后不知道怎么找资源和论坛啊……

这两天发现非常有意思，所有的ICO都在宣称DAPP是未来。但是他们都在中心化交易所里交易，在中心化的Telegram群里聊天。
ZeroNet、RetroShare、bisq一个比一个凉，去TM的去中心化信徒，都是投机客……
还是ZeroMe好玩，即便是在纯匿名的环境下……我也懒得写博客。
相比起国内的阅读App来说，Kindle真是太没有仪式感了，每年也不给出个读书报告啥的：恭喜您，过去一年中买了320本书，平均读完率1%。
想在VPS上给 ZeroNet 建个节点，emmmmm……问题来了，怎么远程访问服务器端的 ZeroNet Web UI 呢？

王欣出来的创业项目据说是区块链，挺有意思的。
一个无意中涉黄进去的人，出来发现行业主流已经变成了诈骗，也是辛酸。
ZeroBlog官方的样式非常不适合显示中文，但如果调了CSS，之后又不好一键升级……

http://127.0.0.1:43110/PeerTube.bit
这个ZeroMe皮笑死了，一打开一股春节红，仿佛以为回到了微博。
不过界面改的还挺好的。
为什么零网的资源站都是BT资源站，而没有emlue资源站呢？
决定把被禁的喊麦扒一遍传到ZeroLSTN上。
Deepfakes现在还没有Gay片，你球homo战斗力不行。
现在哪个emule客户端还在维护？

这篇存晚了，是大年初一发的，那几天没怎么看公众号。
《[那些离开春晚的人](http://127.0.0.1:43110/lastone.bit/?Post:21:%E9%82%A3%E4%BA%9B%E7%A6%BB%E5%BC%80%E6%98%A5%E6%99%9A%E7%9A%84%E4%BA%BA)》
我发现很多信息不会显示在「所有人」频道，但是却会显示在右侧的「活动信息流」里……
ZeroNet最中心化的地方，莫过于几乎只有nofish一个人在开发……
蓝灯是不是又挂了？
最近好像有好几个ICO项目都在往零网方向扩展应用场景？
一天没来，这里突然热闹了。
比起人突然多起来，令我更惊讶的是ZeroMe出了搜索功能？

我觉得微博没整站炸已经算是很不错了，想想今日头条也算是亿级日活产品，还不是说全停24小时就全停。现在他们已经根本不在意影响了好吗……
换句话说，互联网企业目前还没有像安邦保险那样「大到不能倒」的公司，谁都可以倒。

咨询了一下，贵国现在是有能力对比特币体系彻底摧毁的。方法还是老生常谈的51%攻击。
目前虽然交易所、钱包什么的都转移到境外了，但是矿场基本还都在境内。大陆境内现在还保有比特币大约70%左右的算力。
如果动用暴力机关强制（线下）劫持三大矿池，对比特币网络发起51%攻击，什么去中心化体系瞬间完蛋。
而这么做的唯一风险，就是会受到国际的舆论谴责，因为这样摧毁的不只是境内的比特币（内政）还在全球范围内导致了比特币资产归零，可能会被骂是恐怖袭击。
但是国际舆论谴责……emmmm，怎么讲，他在乎嘛？

自己架了一个VPS，注册了公网域名，然后绿标。
以后访问ZeroNet都从这个站点访问了，顺便给各个站点做做种。
emmmm，零网太冷了，连郭文贵和黄片都暖不了场，真的不行……
有办法注册多个ZeroID么？
好困啊。
昨晚梦到我家猫死了，不爽。

啊啊啊啊，求一个ZeroMail的界面地址发一下。
我一直有8个文件更新不了是用不了，我把它删了之后找不到了……
除了Zeroid.Bit之外还有别的可以提供帐户的节点么？

零网基佬站建站进度：0%。
克隆了一个ZeroTalk之后，想要嵌入一个第三方ID认证，然后被我玩挂了……

我倒是觉得，民主自由可能永远都无法「普及」，美国现在开倒车在某种程度上也是可以理解的。
因为相比起民主自由， 《美丽新世界》里那个世界更像是极度自由经济下的帕累托最优解。
就像刘慈欣的《赡养人类》里描述的那样，绝对的自由市场反而会和绝对的垄断与独裁走到同一个终点。

去年网信办鲁炜倒台的时候，很多人叫好。在我看来就是智障，鲁炜真正被干的原因不是腐败，而是对互联网监管抬高了一寸枪口。
比如今日头条的典型后台其实就是鲁炜，人民日报X评今日头条就是从鲁炜内部失势开始的。
而对墙内产品没感觉得人可能没发现，今日头条是中国境内客户端最后一个用户可以对习大大置顶新闻点“不感兴趣”的客户端。
在新的网信办负责人上任几周之后，这个功能就没有了。
喷了，微博都开始封禁LGBTQ了，我的零网基网还没建起来，效率太低了……
Facebook都已经被抵制成那个样子了，ZeroMe的外国用户也没有明显上升……感觉白左也就是假装重视隐私和安全。
ZeroMail在ZeroHello里是没有提醒的嘛……这个作为即时通信也太不即时了……
自己的论坛，分了板块，怎么能让用户只能在子板块发帖？

Zero1069上线
顾名思义，就是那个……基佬站。
http://127.0.0.1:43110/z1069.bit/
我发现我来零网访问最频繁的除了ZeroMe就是BT高清电影网和Play了。还是资源是刚需……
我发现我来零网访问最频繁的除了ZeroMe就是BT高清电影网和Play了。还是资源是刚需……

朝花夕拾好久没更新，来个芯片三联：
《谁能救得了中兴？》http://127.0.0.1:43110/lastone.bit/?Post:27:%E8%B0%81%E8%83%BD%E6%95%91%E5%BE%97%E4%BA%86%E4%B8%AD%E5%85%B4%E9%80%9A%E8%AE%AF%EF%BC%9F
《日本纪录片里的中兴通信》http://127.0.0.1:43110/lastone.bit/?Post:28:%E6%97%A5%E6%9C%AC%E7%BA%AA%E5%BD%95%E7%89%87%E9%87%8C%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%AD%E5%85%B4%E9%80%9A%E8%AE%AF
《万亿科研经费都去哪了？》http://127.0.0.1:43110/lastone.bit/?Post:29:%E4%B8%87%E4%BA%BF%E7%A7%91%E7%A0%94%E7%BB%8F%E8%B4%B9%E9%83%BD%E5%8E%BB%E5%93%AA%E4%BA%86%EF%BC%9F
emmmmmmmmmm，怎么新建一个0-Gallery站？好像不能直接Clone的样子……
打算多开几个云端节点，为大家做种……然后发现Vulter亚洲区的服务器各种售罄。
零网建站，对我这种不会代码的人来说，简直全是坑……
目前为止，有人因为在零网发东西而被请喝茶吗？

比起分享小说和GV，还是分享本子更令人愉悦啊。
这是我新建的基佬/同志/耽美/BL本子相册，大家撸完了记得做种：
http://127.0.0.1:43110/comic.z1069.bit/

This is my gay/homo/BL comic hubs: http://127.0.0.1:43110/comic.z1069.bit/
Welcome to be the seeder.

复制了一个Binchan's GalleryHub，很奇怪这个东西在上传图片时候的逻辑是啥，好像把所有图片都Base64化了似的。每次上传，浏览器都要大吃内存。
但是看了看发布之后的目录结构……是以JPG源文件的形式存在目录里的呀，那转成Base64的目的是啥？
今天怎么回事儿？中国1800多个节点，哪个墙内渠道做了宣传吗？

emmmm……升级了新版之后无法打开新站点了。
下载了新的budle覆盖也不行……
Mac系统，怎么操作？
工作一忙，就没时间上社交网络了，包括ZeroMe。
纽约共识大会开幕了，要捐助Nofish比特币的抓紧了，一般每年共识大会结束后，比特币对发币的价格都会上升100%。

《托你们的福，那个杀害空姐的司机，正躺在家数钱》：http://127.0.0.1:43110/lastone.bit/?Post:31:%E6%89%98%E4%BD%A0%E4%BB%AC%E7%9A%84%E7%A6%8F%EF%BC%8C%E9%82%A3%E4%B8%AA%E6%9D%80%E5%AE%B3%E7%A9%BA%E5%A7%90%E7%9A%84%E5%8F%B8%E6%9C%BA%EF%BC%8C%E6%AD%A3%E8%BA%BA%E5%9C%A8%E5%AE%B6%E6%95%B0%E9%92%B1

首发渠道：二更食堂

删除时间：3小时

作者：郭鑫

后果：二更食堂所有平台账号永久封禁，创始人被约谈，CEO被免职。

额外声明：本文被删除与政治完全无关，这篇文章以商业（流量）为目的对一个陌生的、没有政治和利益冲突的普适性犯罪的受害者进行侮辱，超越了政治派别的 道德底线。

这也是在文章被封杀的彻底性比一些中国官方要求封杀的内容还高的程度，截止到朝花夕拾发布，本文已无任何公开渠道可以浏览。

然而，我觉得需要有人记住这个公司和这个创始人所做的事情，故此备份。
惊了，中国4000多节点，是墙内有人推广了吗？
我的节点数。
Vulter提醒我新加坡节点有货了，于是再为zeronet贡献一个常在节点。
一个疑问：现在整个zeronet有多大了？
我今天的服务器能连接到的中国节点从昨天的3000降到了380……什么鬼。

想在零网上建立一个盗版图书馆，把几年前从网上拖下来的10G电子书包上传上去。
但是，理想的模型其实应该是一个可以全文搜索的站点，然而零网现在还实现不了。

现在的问题是这样的，公网上 DMCA takedown 频发，零网又不能很好的承载大规模资源。
有没有一种从零网反向代理到公网的方法，实现用户在零网里访问，但其实数据从一个公网的中心服务器拉取，但执法机构无法看到这个中心服务器的IP和位置……
好像不能，我想多了。
ZeroNet最近有什么好玩的新站嘛？
我VPS上的zeronet定期挂掉是怎么回事？

传了一份暴走大事件第一季到第五季到IPFS，总共36G：
https://ipfs.io/ipfs/QmPQHJbyVHZhn6hxc89YNjren9T1jakLb8f8CCqB6GjXqo
IPFS 现在有资源站么？类似 ZeroPlay那种。

感觉其实ZeroNet和IPFS整合也没什么难度，只要在现有Bundle里打包上IPFS-Go和Chrome插件就可以了……
大概是Nofish不愿意吧。
我觉得其实ZeroNet现在需要的是一个Zero豆瓣，然后可以基于这个来发展资源中心，并且引发讨论。

这几天考察了现有的几个大文件分享方式：
IPFS的缺陷还是很多的，作为经济激励的FileCoin又没有上线，暂时没有啥优势。
ZeroNet的问题是，你很难要求人们对上G的资源保持持续做种。
Resilio Sync因为自身商业原因砍掉了DHT，把自己玩死了。
bitTorrent，由于没有统一的种子市场很难进行资源检索。
eMule，服务器被封的差不多了……

目前看下来，依然是用ZeroNet来建立检索、用bitTorrent来承载文件比较靠谱。ZeroPlay的缺陷是由单一站点作者控制且只分享电影，应该做一个只分享磁力链接的ZeroUp，那才是真正的零网海盗湾。
分布式最大的敌人其实是苹果，目前没有一款dApp能成功在AppStore上架，这都不是墙国的问题了。是世界范围内都这样……
想来想去，其实现在ZeroNet缺一个中文资源论坛吧……
有人用过炮机嘛？
发现是有做好的Torrent分享论坛的，比如这里：http://127.0.0.1:43110/192dZ1EG5tU7PnCfuwGMDEBrr2eLqvs4t3/?Home
不知道美国人是不是也觉得川普上台之后美国民主疯狂开倒车……

朝花夕拾更新：
《我又一天没挣钱了》
讲罢工的，虎嗅真是国内网络媒体里的良心。
https://fdiao.net/lastone.bit/?Post:33:%E6%88%91%E5%8F%88%E4%B8%80%E5%A4%A9%E6%B2%A1%E6%8C%A3%E9%92%B1%E4%BA%86

朝花夕拾更新。
《百度有木有未来》：http://127.0.0.1:43110/lastone.bit/?Post:35
这篇虽然大概率不是政治原因被删的，但信息量真的大。
在全世界互联网政策都开倒车的情况下，中国倒车进度领先世界20年不知道是好事还是坏事。
打算在 ZeroLSTN 上传一份抖音歌单，你们觉得厚不厚啊？

抖音2018歌单
Most popular music from Tik Tok 2018
http://127.0.0.1:43110/zerolstn.bit/?/playlist/1529817987450

ZeroLSTN 2.0 之后取消了自建节点，然后我不知道现在的做种机制是什么？
今天下午瞎逼传，似乎就出现了一堆种子……
一个问题，为什么外国的下载软件从不整合 emule？很多下载器都是BT\HTTP\FTP通用的，但似乎只有中国的下载软件才会把 emule 协议整合进去。
最近两周都没什么好看的本子……
找到一个800G的GV包，希望下来不是连续剧合集。
Tor也太慢了，暗网的家伙们是怎么忍受的？

Twitter也不好玩，Facebook也不好玩，抛开政治，这类平台最本质的用法还是分享生活。
然而中国人最缺的就是生活……
想问直男，如果一个长得还可以的基佬土豪想要花钱上你，你们觉得多少钱就妥了？
ZeroMe最近有啥好玩的新站嘛？

为什么 ZeroNet 没有一个 iOS 客户端？我阅读了一下苹果的开发者手册，没发现拒绝上架的理由。
Why doesn't ZeroNet have a iOS client? I read Apple's developer manual and found no reason to reject it.
微力同步是不是没有什么人用了？
类似DHT的那个功能怎么还没上……

《[教父徐小平“割”了谁的命？](http://127.0.0.1:43110/lastone.bit/?Post:43)》
作者已被徐小平送进公安局。
朝花夕拾更新：《裁员滚滚来》http://127.0.0.1:43110/lastone.bit/?Post:44:%E8%A3%81%E5%91%98%E6%BD%AE%E6%BB%9A%E6%BB%9A%E6%9D%A5
两个月没来，人更少了……
微博又有炸号潮了。
百度网盘的磁力链离线下载功能停止了。

当社会的焦点集中在意识形态斗争、贸易战、国际政治这些宏大叙事上的时候，日子就会过得比较无聊。
毕竟在这种尺度的历史中，我们都只是一个数字。
还是前两年移动互联网刚起来，大家都在讨论智能手机、可穿戴设备、VRAR的时候普通人的日子过着更有趣。
我现在仅仅奢求有人给 eMule 做个更符合 2018 年的界面，并且出个 Android 版本。

指望创作者来零网创作是不现实的，毕竟这里的受众太窄了。现阶段应该尽可能多的搬运那些公网上有可能被删除的内容，满足内容消费者的需求而不是内容生产者的需求。
但是到现在，还没有一个好用的基于 RSS to ZeroBlog 的爬虫出现，这才是零网内容搬运搞不起来的原因。
佛了，用 Hexo 导入一个上万条数据的站点进 ZeroNet，然后把 ZeroNet 主程拖垮了。把站点删了才能再进来……

Hexo ZeroNet 评论
Hexo 抓取 RSS
文章去重
Hexo 自动部署到 ZeroNet
分别都跑通了，明天试着整合一下。
怎么通过命令行签名并发布一篇文章？
Namecoin 网络是不是堵塞了？注册了两个新域名，都超过48小时了还没确认。

从RSS获取文章→生成Hexo→从Hexo部署到ZeroNet→ZeroNet签名发布

现在卡在最后一步，有人知道怎么用命令行签发网站么？因为现在整个链条是基于一个定时Shell脚本的。
还有一个问题，Mac 上的 Crontab 不执行可还行……

我十分确定，NameCoin 是网络堵塞了，但是这么冷门的币都堵塞的话说明基本没什么矿工在挖了。
 目测 ZeroNet 需要换DNS系统。

看了一下 NameCoin 的浏览器，最新的域名注册基本都使用了 10 个左右的 NMC，现在 NMC 价格是  3 美元一枚，相当于每个域名要花 30 美元。
也许ZeroNet应该考虑更换DNS服务了。
Looking at NameCoin's browser, the latest domain name registrations use about 10 NMC,. The NMC now costs $3.00 each, which is equivalent to $30 per domain name.
Perhaps ZeroNet should consider replacing the DNS service.

RSS to Hexo to ZeroNet 还是有问题。
Hexo 虽然可以在零网浏览和评论，但是无法被关注、不能被搜索，非常不适合在零网持续跟踪，基本就会成为一个死站。
好奇心日报镜像站：http://127.0.0.1:43110/19D2YAKnXjHfMcC2Cp4ERpNEGA4yCyjjr

哪个交易所可以在不进行 KYC 的情况下购买 Namecoin？
Which exchange can buy Namecoin? without KYC
I am back

Looking back at the news when I left, the development of ZeroNet does not seem to be fast.
Maybe I should hibernate longer.

Mainland China is launching a ban on online pornography in the name of protecting minors, not just for child pornography but also for normal adult content.
This campaign has been going on for a decade, and pornography in the Chinese language is deteriorating.
Perhaps a zero-network-based novel serialization site (think qidian.com or Dengeki Bunko Online) should be built, which is not only convenient for readers to read, but also allows authors to keep updating.
But ZeroNet can't be used on the iPhone, and the younger generation in China likes to use the iPhone.

In order to promote ZeroNet to Chinese porn writers, I experienced the process of using ZeroNet from scratch two days ago.
The biggest problem with the experience is cold boot: When running ZeroNet for the first time, all built-in Trackers are blocked by mainland China, and it is difficult to access ZeroNet without VPN.
If this problem is not resolved, in the view of most Chinese users who do not understand technology, ZeroNet's experience is no different from using VPN to access Google, Facebook, and Twitter. ZeroNet loses its appeal and competitiveness.

Governments around the world are strengthening their regulatory policies on the Internet, which is uncomfortable but not a desperate situation. In history, almost all technologies that drive social change go through this phase. Technical determinism is wrong, but it does not mean that social determinism is correct. In the end, a balance will be found between technology and society. This process is very long, and being in such an era will make us feel bad.
Metanarrative is a memetic virus whose self-consistency affects people's independent thinking about microscopic problems.

We need a better network, but the current Web 3.0 application is too rudimentary.

Worse is, because this round of Internet entrepreneurs is tied to digital cryptocurrencies, they are too easy to make money.

It's hard to imagine that you can start making a big profit by inventing a TCP/IP protocol in the classic Internet, which is very common in the Web 3.0 world.

In fact, not making money is an important reason for the continued innovation of the classic Internet industry. The classic Internet has been 40 years old, and its business model has gradually stabilized until the last decade. It has also slowed down its pace of innovation since it can start to make money.

Contrary to "Stay hungry, Stay foolish", the current Web3.0 feels like "I am rich, I am smart." This is not like a typical innovation industry should look like, it is like a monopoly industry.

Current psychology and psychotherapy often focus on the experiences experienced by individuals and treat them as important causes of mental illness (such as anxiety, depression, etc.).

But in recent years, the significant increase in the incidence of mental illness worldwide has shown that perhaps some collective experience or shared memory in today's society is the cause of the disease, not the individual experience.

Many Web 3.0 applications (except ZeroNet) are based on the classic Internet DNS service. I don't know if these developers have problems with their heads.

The value of distributed applications is that every aspect of their services is not controlled by the central authority. Because the regulator can kill the project through any link it can control.

So there are only two types of project here, one is a 100% decentralized application and the other is a centralized application.

Incomplete decentralization will only increase project operating costs and will not increase benefits.

The Internet does not fulfill the promise of connecting everyone.

The consequences of simple and direct connection between individuals of different cultures, religions, and the whole are more conflicts and disputes.

In the past, there were some vague and beautiful consensuses among different groups, such as “justice”, “equality”, “love”, “honesty”, etc...

And when the Internet allows people from completely different cultures to communicate directly, these consensuses no longer exist. For example, when talking about "love," Christians, homosexuals, and Muslims have completely different definitions and have irreconcilable contradictions with each other.

To make matters worse, due to the acceleration of the Internet's circulation of information, more and more people "only" through the Internet to understand other groups, which leads to more prejudice and estrangement.

When we meet other people on the Internet, we are only encountering an informational person, not a real living person. When we oppose a point on the Internet, we tend to oppose those who hold those opinions. But we often overlook that those views are not the whole of that person, but just a very small aspect of his life.

This is why the Internet has weakened our empathy.

Today is the first day of the retirement of Ma Yun, Chairman of Alibaba's(taobao,alipay) Board of Directors, and the first time that China's first-generation Internet giant has changed its main leader.

There were a lot of voices before that wanted Mark Zuckerberg to leave Facebook, because in China and Europe and the United States, Internet companies have mastered the power far beyond their capabilities.

However, forcing Internet companies to change leaders is not the right thing. How can you guarantee that the ethical level of the next CEO or chairman is higher than this?

In fact, personal will is not important in a modern company, even if this person is the company's top leader. The modern corporate system requires him to think like a professional manager. He is responsible to shareholders, to consider revenue, and to fight against competitors. How to use this power to treat this society may be one of the least considered things for business leaders.

He may not even think that it is something he should think about because it is why we call it a business leader rather than a national leader.

Therefore, there is a new problem here. When the power and capabilities of multinational Internet companies exceed the traditional government, should we have a new system for citizens (not just shareholders) to participate in the management of these enterprises?
2019，明网先后经历了Tumblr扫黄和Twitter扫黄，结果ZeroNet及其它Web3应用还是没发展起来……怎么讲，就真是不行吧。
Nothing new.

Both Dat and IPFS are starting to offer paid node services.

If a person wants to keep his website online 24 hours a day, and his computer can't be online all the time, he can buy a node to host his own website.

Ironic but useful, like the early Internet, distributed networks are spontaneously forming centers.

It has been recommended that some content creators use ZeroNet to distribute their content, but compared with the existing content distribution platforms (Wordpress.com and Medium), the learning cost of its site is too high.
There is really a need for a program that synchronizes the RSS of the ClearNet website to ZeroBlog.
我觉得有这么一群肖战粉丝比中国政府可怕多了，后者好歹能甩锅是系统之恶，前者这群压根不是人啊，是自发形成的恶性集团。

为什么即便是经历了汤不热的扫黄，推特的半扫黄，深海先生被抓以及这次的肖战事件，Web 3.0的相关应用还是用不起来？

原因可能很简单，无论哪一次被封，被封的中心化站点与可用的去中心化解决方案之间都存在着巨大的体验差异。简单点说，就是去中心化解决方案对目前的普通网民来说太难用了。

但是这个就引出了另一个问题，就是那些体验好的中心化方案都被封了，难道普通网民就不写黄文、不发黄文、不看黄漫了么？难道在这些人的决策中，便利就这么远高于自由么？

这个问题我近期才想明白，对于大众来说这个答案可能确实是肯定的。便利性在某些领域就是要高于一切，经典互联网诞生之初它的自由性是最高的，在过去40年里它的自由性一直在下降，但相反的是过去40年里它的总用户数在不断增加，这得益于它便利性的大幅增加。

所以Web3.0发展不起来真的不能赖用户意识觉悟不高，不便利和体验差是互联网产品的原罪。

ZeroNet是技术层面很不成熟，但它形成了一个从理念-技术-应用的完整闭环，尽管这个闭环看起来是玩具。
IPFS和其它的一些Web 3.0技术可能在技术层面上更好，但目前来看比ZeroNet更不符合普通人使用。

我觉得微博女权说的“男人天生就是强奸犯”是没错的，但错误的是想要改变“男人天生就是强奸犯”的这种想法。

正确的思路是应该解除社会施加给女性的加锁，让“女人天生也是强奸犯”。

怎么讲，这才是符合你球人天性的平等。

我其实挺反感人类的，但和一般的反社会不太一样。

我并不反人类社会整体，也不反对任何社会组织形式。相反，我甚至觉得人类到目前为止所有存在过的和未来可能存在的假想组织形式都差不多，解决不了太大问题，也分不出高下。

我是觉得人类作为一个生物就不太行，所以社会是啥样都救不了。

我希望人类灭绝，但也不希望是因为某种极端灾难。我就希望人类迎来一个静默到倒退，然后逐渐在和平中灭绝。

一方面，人类作为一个折腾出这么多花样的物种，值得一个善终。

另一方面，这种静默退化更能说明人类本身是一个垃圾物种，而不是说把灭绝的锅甩给什么意外。

------

I actually dislike humans, but I am not the same as general antisocieties.

I am not against human society as a whole, nor against any form of social organization. On the contrary, I even think that all the imaginary organizational forms that humans have existed so far and that may exist in the future are similar, cannot solve too many problems, and can not distinguish the superiors.

I think that human beings are not good enough as a creature, so society can't save anything.

I want humanity to become extinct, but I don’t want it to be because of some kind of extreme disaster. I hope that mankind will usher in a silent degradation, and then gradually become extinct in peace.

On the one hand, human beings as a tossing out so many patterns deserve a good end.

On the other hand, this silent degradation is more indicative of human beings as a junk species, rather than blaming the cause of extinction on accidents.

@大家一起p2p: 我觉得光靠中文圈是不行的，这次Facebook事件，欧美都发起卸载Facebook运动，为什么不装一波零网。从Facebook迁移到Snap，一家大公司迁移到另一家大公司有什么意义……不是很明白白左们的逻辑。
@大家一起p2p: 是，其实早在这一波SSD推广之前，我就觉得硬盘容量已经过度发展了。再加上现在大家都不在硬盘里保存电影、音乐资源了，个人产生的文档和照片根本填不满硬盘。
总体来说，我特别期望Nofish发币，应该能大规模炒热ZeroNet。然后一些具体的应用场景，其实可以吸引那些在Telegram做社群的币圈人，大幅度丰富用户多样性和内容多样性。
@Mv00: 可以强行有一下呀，至少带些人气进来，然后也能吸引为了淘金而来的一些DAPP开发者。

@Mv00: 从商业社会角度讲，一个项目的长期发展主要看人才和资本，ZeroNet现在两个都缺，币圈现在两个都不缺。而且ZeroNet的去中心理念，至少比币圈现有的许多空气项目要距离区块链进的多。可以引入区块链搭建一个ZeroNet的经济系统，比如为常在节点和Tracker发币（相当于挖矿），也可以参考Steemit，为内容生产者发币，以激励他们的共享行为。ZeroNet甚至可以不自己深入去搭建每一个具体的应用模块，而是发一个币来作为ZeroNet中的法币，然后实现ZeroNet发币与各经济模块的自由兑换。比如现在大家要注册域名，兑换NameCoin非常麻烦。
@Mv00: 以后可以，你用ZNB（ZeroNet法定货币）自动转成NameCoin购买域名。然后你在Steemit的ZeroNet版本上发文章，你获得的收益也自动转成ZNB，然后挖矿（做种）也可以自动获得ZNB。
@大家一起p2p: 30G的3A游戏根本不应该放在硬盘上，硬盘太慢了。而且对于这种一次性写需求的介质，光盘永远会比硬盘快。哪怕上了SSD。
@大家一起p2p: “光盘永远会比硬盘快。”这句话不准确，应该是在同样的商业成本下，光盘永远会比硬盘快。比如游戏主机不会贸然上一个特别快的硬盘作为介质的，对整机的成本提升太高不利于主机推广。

ZeroNet's progress is too slow, which gives traditional commercial Internet companies the opportunity to self-improve and block ZeroNet.

@Trotski: The crux of the matter is that the privacy and security needs of most users, whether in China or the United States or Europe, are not enough to drive them away from Centralized network products (Like Facebook and WeChat) with good product experience.Decentralized products must learn from their competitors in terms of user experience.One click to get started is a very necessary user experience, for most users who don't understand technology.
@leftside: Packaging ZeroNet with a Tor browser, or even an IPFS-JS client, might be a good option.

@Trotski: Content creators (text, images, music...) often don't have enough IT capabilities around the world. If the use of ZN becomes simpler, content creators will naturally enter ZN, reducing the idiot density in ZeroTalk.

@Publicality: no, metanarrative refers to solving all problems in the world with a grand narrative.

Christianity, socialism, and democracy are three different typical narratives.
Its greatest feature is that it has a self-explanatory and unproven discourse system, no matter if you encounter any problem, you can use the same framework to find the "correct" answer.

"Marriage concept", "national economic problems", "personal career development". Metanarrative attempts to explain all the problems from personal life to the development of human society, even though those problems have not yet appeared in the era of this meta-narrative invention.

The above text is my own understanding, accurate and detailed definition can refer to Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Metanarrative

@Ansho Rei: I don't mean that these conflicts were born in the Internet age, but the Internet has expanded some old conflicts.
Samuel Phillips Huntington described these conflicts in The Clash of Civilizations in 1993.

@Git Center: Everything is fine now.

@Moor: However, in my personal observation of Chinese Internet companies, adopting democracy (or decentralization) to govern enterprises will lead to some commercial problems.
The Chinese Internet welcomes 2-3 opportunities every quarter (called "Typhoon Eye" in China, meaning that even if the pig is in the right position, it can fly), which requires the company to make very fast decisions, not even Consider the consequences beyond its commercial interests.
The bottom-up decision-making mechanism may delay the timing of making the right decision (or wrong decision).
In a fast-moving industry, whether you make the right decision or make a wrong decision, making a slow decision is the most wrong decision. This may give your business a good morality and then be killed by a competitor.
@Moor: I just started thinking about this, and I haven't had any constructive ideas other than the question itself. I have not heard of an alternative system before, if you want, can you share it.

tl;tr
Convalescent plasma is effective. It cures a lot of people in China. But hydroxychloroquine is ineffective and toxic.

@Realjohndoe: Yes, China uses convalescent plasma only in the most dangerous moments. As things improve, it has been banned again. This should not be a routine treatment because convalescent plasma usually has an unpredictably high rate of side effects. And the sale of blood as a drug has its own moral defects.
@Geekless: Thank you very much.

Are you considering making a RSS to ZeroBlog crawler? 
ZeroNet needs more content from ClearNet to help people just use ZeroNet to browse the Internet. 
An automated crawler will greatly enrich the content of ZeroNet. I think it can be a stand-alone program written by Java or Python, not necessarily within the development framework of ZeroNet. After crawling, the content can be directly injected into the local ZeroBlog database, and then the user can manually sign and publish it on the ZeroNet interface.
For most users, it's too hard to use.
